title: The Vagabond Cat: A Story for Children and Adults
description:
A charming and funny but also profound and moving book.
This is the story of a cat called Mateo and his owner, a poor bricklayer who struggled to make ends meet. But it is also the story of three children and their unpredictable behaviour, and the story of an old lady and her peculiar little world, and the story of a beautiful model and her crazy boyfriend…Age 9+
author: Elena Horas-San Martín
